test.name: Successfull Signup

kw.name: Open browser to signup page
kw.doc: Open the browser

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go to miro singup page
kw.doc: Open Miro signup page

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Get started free today page should be open
kw.doc: Verifies the signup page

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Get started free today'.

kw.name: Create Miro account
kw.doc: Successfull creation of the account to Miro

kw.name: Enter Username
kw.doc: Enters valid name or leave blank

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Enter EmailID
kw.doc: Enters valid or invalid email address or leave blank

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Enter Password
kw.doc: Enters valid or invalid password or leave blank

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Select Terms Checkbox
kw.doc: Selects Terms and Privacy policy checkbox

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Click on Get started now button
kw.doc: Clicks on Get started now

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.
kw.msg: ${page_title} = Sign up | Miro | Online Whiteboard for Visual Collaboration

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.arg: "${page_title}" == "Please check your email, Online Whiteboard | Miro"
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Existing email id
kw.doc: Verifies the message if existing email id provided

kw.name: Get Text
kw.arg: xpath://div[contains(text(),'Sorry, this email is already registered')]
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: ${get_text} = Sorry, this email is already registered

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.arg: Sorry, this email is already registered
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: This test case will verify the successfull creation of the account with Miro.

test.name: No account should be created if Terms and Privacy policy checkbox not selected

kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.doc: Verifies the signup page

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Get started free today'.

kw.name: Invalid emailid
kw.doc: Enter invalid or incomplete email address in email text box and check the user message. the values are assigned to all variables in variables section

kw.name: Enter Username
kw.doc: Enters valid name or leave blank

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Enters valid or invalid email address or leave blank

kw.name: Get Text
kw.arg: xpath://div[contains(text(),'This doesn’t look like an email address. Please ch')]
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: ${get_text} = This doesn’t look like an email address. Please check it for typos and try again.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.arg: This doesn’t look like an email address. Please check it for typos and try again.
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: "This doesn’t look like an email address. Please check it for typos and try again." message should be displayed if invalid email addess provided

kw.doc: Throws warning message if the password not meets the password policy.

kw.name: Enter Username
kw.doc: Enters valid name or leave blank

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Enters valid or invalid email address or leave blank

kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Enter Password
kw.doc: Enters valid or invalid password or leave blank

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.arg: Check the message if password <8 char
Check the message if password >=8 and <=9 char
Check the message if password >9 and <=11 char
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Check the message if password <8 char
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.arg: xpath://div[contains(text(),'Please use 8+ characters for secure password')]
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: ${get_warning} = Please use 8+ characters for secure password

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.arg: Please use 8+ characters for secure password
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
